articles.description: England midfielder Jude Bellingham is given a one-match suspended ban for his crotch-grabbing gesture after scoring against Slovakia.

articles.description: Turkey defender Merih Demiral is given a two-match ban for making an ultra-nationalist salute during his country's Euro 2024 win against Austria.
